title: Fedoptima: Optimizing Resource Utilization in Federated Learning
affiliations: University of St Andrews, affiliation not provided to SSRN and University of St Andrews

detail.title: Fedoptima: Optimizing Resource Utilization in Federated Learning
detail.abstract: Federated learning (FL) systems facilitate distributed machine learning across a server and multiple devices. However, FL systems have low resource utilization on servers and devices, limiting their practical use in the real world. This inefficiency primarily arises from two types of idle time: (i) task dependency between the server and devices, and (ii) stragglers among heterogeneous devices. This paper introduces FedOptima, a resource-optimized FL system designed to simultaneously minimize both types of idle time; existing systems do not eliminate or reduce both at the same time. FedOptima offloads the training of certain layers of a neural network from a device to a server using three innovations. First, devices operate independently of each other using asynchronous aggregation to eliminate straggler effects, and independently of the server by utilizing auxiliary networks to minimize idle time caused by task dependency. Second, the server performs centralized training using a task scheduler that ensures balanced contributions from all devices, improving model accuracy. Third, an efficient memory management mechanism on the server increases the scalability of the number of participating devices. Extensive experiments are conducted on multiple lab-based testbeds, evaluated on image classification and sentiment analysis tasks with CNNs and Transformers. Compared to four state-of-the-art offloading-based and asynchronous FL baselines, FedOptima (i) achieves higher or comparable accuracy, (ii) accelerates training by 1.9x to 21.8x, (iii) reduces server and device idle time by up to 93.9% and 81.8%, respectively, and (iv) increases throughput by 1.1x to 2.0x.

AI.tldr: FedOptima是一种资源优化的联邦学习系统，通过异步聚合和任务调度等技术，显著减少服务器和设备的空闲时间，提升训练效率和准确性。
AI.research_question: 如何设计一个联邦学习系统，同时减少服务器和设备因任务依赖和异构设备导致的空闲时间？
AI.motivation: 现有联邦学习系统资源利用率低，主要由于任务依赖和异构设备导致的空闲时间问题，限制了实际应用。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于异步聚合、任务调度和内存管理的理论框架。
AI.method: 采用异步聚合消除设备间的依赖，任务调度平衡设备贡献，服务器集中训练和内存管理提升扩展性。
AI.findings: FedOptima在准确性和训练速度上优于现有基线，显著减少空闲时间并提升吞吐量。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种同时优化服务器和设备空闲时间的联邦学习系统设计理论。
AI.practical_contributions: FedOptima在实际任务中表现优异，为联邦学习的实际部署提供了高效解决方案。

title: To Hide or Highlight? An Emphasis on Corporate Integrity Culture and Foreign Corrupt Practices Act Violation
affiliations: Grand Valley State University, Grand Valley State University and Western Illinois University

detail.title: To Hide or Highlight? An Emphasis on Corporate Integrity Culture and Foreign Corrupt Practices Act Violation
detail.abstract: President Trump’s recent suspension of the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act (FCPA) enforcement by the U.S. Department of Justice renews the debate over the value of anti-corruption regulation and increases the importance of voluntary anti-corruption measures. This paper investigates the relationship between a firm’s emphasis on integrity culture, an important component of anti-corruption plans, and its FCPA compliance. We find that when FCPA violations happened in a firm, its management was more likely to promote high corporate integrity culture at the same time. This result indicates that emphasizing integrity does not guarantee an ethical corporate environment; rather, it may serve as a cover for unethical activities.

AI.tldr: 特朗普暂停FCPA执法引发对反腐败法规价值的讨论，本文研究发现企业强调诚信文化可能与FCPA违规行为同时发生，表明诚信文化可能成为不道德行为的掩护。
AI.research_question: 企业强调诚信文化与其FCPA合规性之间有何关系？
AI.motivation: 特朗普暂停FCPA执法引发对反腐败法规价值的争议，增加了自愿反腐败措施的重要性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 诚信文化作为反腐败计划的重要组成部分。
AI.method: 研究企业在FCPA违规时是否同时强调诚信文化。
AI.findings: FCPA违规时，管理层更可能同时强调高诚信文化，表明诚信文化可能掩盖不道德行为。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了诚信文化与实际合规行为之间的潜在矛盾。
AI.practical_contributions: 提醒企业诚信文化的推广需与实际行为一致，避免成为不道德行为的掩护。

title: Does Performance Timing Affect Executive Compensation? Evidence of Anchoring
affiliations: The Stephen M. Ross School of Business at the University of Michigan, University of Wyoming, Bucknell University and Bucknell University

detail.title: Does Performance Timing Affect Executive Compensation? Evidence of Anchoring
detail.abstract: Board members are responsible for evaluating the performance of the CEO and making changes to CEO compensation based on actual performance. In this study, we examine how the timing of CEO performance (i.e., performance early in the year relative to performance later in the year) affects changes in compensation. We find that the timing of CEO performance is linked to changes in cash compensation, with performance earlier in the year having a stronger effect on compensation. We further explore this finding through supplemental analyses and provide evidence that compensation is more sensitive to performance captured in earnings announcements and that the timing effect is concentrated in busy boards. While we do not provide direct evidence of the thought process employed by board members, our pattern of results is consistent with the cognitive bias of anchoring where individuals place too much weight on initial information.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了CEO绩效的时间分布（年初与年末）如何影响其薪酬变化，发现年初绩效对薪酬影响更大，且薪酬对财报公告中的绩效更敏感。这一现象在忙碌的董事会中更为明显，可能与锚定效应有关。
AI.research_question: CEO绩效的时间分布如何影响其薪酬变化？
AI.motivation: 董事会需根据CEO实际绩效调整薪酬，但绩效的时间分布是否影响决策尚不明确。
AI.theoretical_framework: 锚定效应（认知偏差理论）。
AI.method: 实证分析CEO绩效时间与薪酬变化的关系，辅以补充分析。
AI.findings: 年初绩效对薪酬影响更大，薪酬对财报公告绩效更敏感，忙碌董事会中时间效应更显著。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了绩效时间分布对薪酬决策的影响，支持锚定效应的作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为董事会薪酬决策提供参考，提示需警惕锚定效应带来的偏差。

title: Do Firms Pass Commodity Cost Savings to Consumers? Evidence and Impacts of Asymmetric Pricing Behavior in the U.S. Airline Industry
affiliations: Iowa State University, Utah State University, School of Accountancy and Iowa State University - Debbie and Jerry Ivy College of Business

detail.title: Do Firms Pass Commodity Cost Savings to Consumers? Evidence and Impacts of Asymmetric Pricing Behavior in the U.S. Airline Industry
detail.abstract: We examine airlines’ pricing behavior with respect to fuel cost fluctuations. Managerial accounting “cost-plus” pricing models assume that a firm would adjust selling prices to “pass through” an increase or decrease in the costs of inputs. Using archival data, we find some evidence of airline pricing power ­– managers retain selling prices when fuel costs decrease. We also document pricing behavior that is more consistent with consumer power: airlines absorb a larger portion of commodity cost increases than they enjoy commodity cost decreases. Further, the periods of airline pricing power and consumer power correlate rationally with the changes in the economic environment within the airline industry. Managers offset margins eroded by commodity fuel cost increases by reducing employee compensation, increasing long-term debt, and by depleting cash reserves. Retained cost savings reverse some of those trends.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了航空公司在燃油成本波动下的定价行为，发现航空公司倾向于在燃油成本下降时保持售价（定价权），而在成本上升时吸收更多成本（消费者权力）。此外，定价行为与经济环境变化相关，并通过调整员工薪酬、增加长期债务和消耗现金储备来抵消成本上升的影响。
AI.research_question: 航空公司在燃油成本波动下的定价行为是怎样的？
AI.motivation: 探讨航空公司是否遵循管理会计的“成本加成”定价模型，以及定价行为背后的驱动因素。
AI.theoretical_framework: 管理会计的“成本加成”定价模型、定价权与消费者权力的理论框架。
AI.method: 使用档案数据进行分析。
AI.findings: 航空公司在燃油成本下降时倾向于保持售价（定价权），而在成本上升时吸收更多成本（消费者权力）。定价行为与经济环境变化相关，并通过调整员工薪酬、增加长期债务和消耗现金储备来抵消成本上升的影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了定价权与消费者权力的理论，揭示了定价行为与经济环境的动态关系。
AI.practical_contributions: 为航空公司管理者提供了定价策略的参考，并揭示了成本波动下的财务调整手段。

title: Multi-Objective Phased Optimization Framework of Grey-Green-Blue Infrastructure for Synergistic Runoff Control in Data-Scarce Regions
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, Hohai University, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Multi-Objective Phased Optimization Framework of Grey-Green-Blue Infrastructure for Synergistic Runoff Control in Data-Scarce Regions
detail.abstract: Gray-green-blue infrastructure (GGBI) plays a critical role in urban flood mitigation through the integrated operation of rapid pumping drainage and source control measures. However, conventional multi-objective optimization models typically focus on individual flood control measures, overlooking pumping stations due to complex system interactions and uncertain synergies. Furthermore, the hydrological models coupled with optimization algorithms necessitate exceptionally high standards for data quantity, quality, and precision. To address this issue, this study proposes a multi-objective phased optimization framework with water surface ratio and green measures as decision variables, while incorporating pumping station design discharge determined through fitting relationships, focusing on the objectives of annual total cost (ATC) and runoff volume reduction rate (RVRR). Phase I optimization is particularly suitable for preliminary planning in data-scarce regions, and its determined decision variable ranges served as boundary constraints for the Phase Ⅱ spatial layout optimization. A case study was conducted in Handan, Hebei Province, China. The Results demonstrate that pumping stations enable rapid river discharge in limited green-blue infrastructure space, effectively controlling water levels below 5.1m. The decision variables corresponding to Phase I optimization are 16.09~37.13 m3/s pumping station drainage flow, 1% lake and 5% river water surface ratios, 31.6%~69% sunken green space, and 10%~26.4% permeable pavement ratios, respectively, establishing scientifical constraints for Phase II spatial optimization. This multi-objective phased optimization framework comprehensively accounts for the synergistic effects of GGBI and offers innovative solutions for flood mitigation optimization in data-scarce regions, contributing significantly to the resilience enhancement of urban drainage systems.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种多目标分阶段优化框架，用于城市洪水缓解中的灰绿蓝基础设施（GGBI）优化，特别关注数据稀缺地区的初步规划。
AI.research_question: 如何在数据稀缺地区通过多目标分阶段优化框架优化灰绿蓝基础设施（GGBI）以缓解城市洪水？
AI.motivation: 传统的多目标优化模型通常忽视泵站等复杂系统交互和协同效应，且水文模型对数据要求极高，亟需一种适用于数据稀缺地区的优化方法。
AI.theoretical_framework: 灰绿蓝基础设施（GGBI）理论、多目标优化理论、水文模型与优化算法耦合理论。
AI.method: 提出多目标分阶段优化框架，以水面比例和绿色措施为决策变量，结合泵站设计流量拟合关系，分两阶段优化（初步规划与空间布局优化）。
AI.findings: 泵站在有限绿蓝空间内快速排水，有效控制水位低于5.1米；第一阶段优化结果为泵站排水流量16.09~37.13 m3/s、湖泊1%和河流5%的水面比例、下沉绿地31.6%~69%、透水铺装10%~26.4%。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了适用于数据稀缺地区的多目标分阶段优化框架，全面考虑了GGBI的协同效应。
AI.practical_contributions: 为城市排水系统韧性提升提供了创新解决方案，尤其在数据稀缺地区的洪水缓解优化中具有显著应用价值。

title: Designing Severance Insurance: Theory and Evidence from Ethiopia
affiliations: World Bank - International Finance Corporation (IFC), University of Warwick, University of Warwick, Peking University and University College London

detail.title: Designing Severance Insurance: Theory and Evidence from Ethiopia
detail.abstract: We propose the first experimental study testing firms’ demand for insurance against layoff costs. Job-loss insurance policies for workers, such as severance pay, impose substantial financial burdens on firms precisely when they face shocks motivating layoffs. We evaluate demand for a novel product, Severance Insurance, which protects firms against these costs, among formal employers in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia. Within a unified theoretical and empirical framework, we jointly estimate and compare key parameters to evaluate the benefits and costs of this product: firms' value of insurance, adverse selection in insurance purchase, and descriptive evidence of moral hazard through increased layoffs and changes in firm growth and workforce formalization. Our findings offer critical insights for designing employer-based social insurance policies and shed light on firms’ capacity to manage risk.

AI.tldr: 本文首次通过实验研究测试企业对裁员成本保险的需求，评估了一种新型产品“裁员保险”在埃塞俄比亚亚的斯亚贝巴的正式雇主中的需求。

AI.motivation: 裁员成本（如遣散费）在企业面临裁员冲击时带来巨大财务负担，研究此类保险的需求有助于设计雇主社会政策。

AI.method: 实验研究，联合估计关键参数（保险价值、逆向选择、道德风险）。

title: Rewarding a Leadership Team: Insights from CEO Pay Slice and Pay Dispersion Among the CEO'S Top Team
affiliations: University of Calgary - Haskayne School of Business, University of North Florida and University of Calgary

detail.title: Rewarding a Leadership Team: Insights from CEO Pay Slice and Pay Dispersion Among the CEO'S Top Team
detail.abstract: Rewarding a top leadership team (TLT)—a diverse group of executives working collaboratively to guide the organization—presents a complex challenge. Building on existing yet conflicting theories, we adopt a team-based perspective that acknowledges the importance of the CEO’s unique role within the team and the dynamics among other team members. Specifically, we analyze TLT compensation along two dimensions: (1) the size of the CEO pay slice, reflecting payment for the CEO’s team leadership and management skill, and (2) the degree of pay dispersion among the CEO’s executive team, capturing the extent to which payment is based on team versus individual effort. Our findings, based on analysis of a longitudinal sample, show that, on average, TLTs characterized by a larger CEO pay slice and lower degree of pay dispersion among the CEO’s top team outperform other combinations in terms of return on assets. Our analysis of DuPont components indicates that higher slice and lower dispersion outperform other combinations for customer value (profit margin) while lower slice and lower dispersion outperform other combinations for operating efficiency (asset turnover). Overall, our results highlight the complementary relations between CEO team leadership and team-based compensation in rewarding TLTs.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了如何奖励高层领导团队（TLT）的问题，发现CEO薪酬份额较大且团队内薪酬分散度较低的TLT在资产回报率上表现更好。
AI.research_question: 如何通过薪酬设计优化高层领导团队（TLT）的绩效？
AI.motivation: 奖励TLT是一个复杂挑战，现有理论存在冲突，需要从团队角度分析CEO和团队成员的角色及动态关系。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于团队视角，结合CEO的独特角色和团队成员间的动态关系。
AI.method: 分析TLT薪酬的两个维度：CEO薪酬份额和团队内薪酬分散度，使用纵向样本数据。
AI.findings: CEO薪酬份额较大且薪酬分散度较低的TLT在资产回报率上表现更好；不同组合在客户价值（利润率）和运营效率（资产周转率）上表现各异。
AI.theory_contributions: 强调了CEO团队领导力与团队薪酬设计的互补关系。
AI.practical_contributions: 为设计TLT薪酬提供了实践指导，优化团队绩效。

title: Compact Dual-Band Filter Based on S-Shaped Dual-Mode Resonator
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Compact Dual-Band Filter Based on S-Shaped Dual-Mode Resonator
detail.abstract: A miniaturized dual-bandpass filter using S-shaped dual-mode Stepped Impedance Resonator (SSIR) is presented in this letter. Even- and odd-mode methods are used to analyze the SSIR. By determining the impedance ratio and physical length of the SSIR, the high order resonant frequency can be tuned for generating the dual-band bandpass-filtering response operating at 2.4/3.6GHz. Multiple transmission zeros are generated to improve the frequency selectivity of the bandpass filter. The measurement results of the fabricated bandpass filter have a reasonable agreement with the simulation ones.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于S形双模阶梯阻抗谐振器（SSIR）的小型化双带通滤波器，通过偶模和奇模方法分析SSIR，并通过调整阻抗比和物理长度实现2.4/3.6GHz的双带通滤波响应，同时生成多个传输零点以提高频率选择性。
AI.research_question: 如何设计一种小型化双带通滤波器，并实现高频率选择性？
AI.motivation: 满足现代通信系统对小型化和高性能滤波器的需求。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于S形双模阶梯阻抗谐振器（SSIR）的理论，利用偶模和奇模分析方法。
AI.method: 通过调整SSIR的阻抗比和物理长度，设计并实现双带通滤波器，并通过仿真和测量验证性能。

title: A Deep Learning Model Integrating Flight Dynamics Information Features for Aircraft Trajectory Prediction
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: A Deep Learning Model Integrating Flight Dynamics Information Features for Aircraft Trajectory Prediction
detail.abstract: The terminal airspace of airports is characterized by a high flight density and numerous interferences. Flight paths frequently deviate due to factors such as flight intentions, environmental conditions, and aircraft performance. Accurate forecasting of these paths is essential for enhancing flight safety and ensuring the safety of the aircraft. To address the issue of inaccurate track predictions in out-of-field environments, a CNN-Transformer-BiGRU hybrid model was employed. This model incorporates high-dimensional feature engineering, including physical constraints such as the thrust-to-weight ratio and rate of heading change, and introduces an explicit labeling mechanism for turning points based on the rate of change in the heading angle. The framework was validated using a Quick Access Recorder (QAR) departure dataset from the Dalian Zhoushuizi Airport. Experimental results demonstrated that, compared to other baseline models, the proposed framework reduced the longitude RMSE and MAE by 93.77% and 94.46%, respectively, whereas the errors in latitude and altitude decreased by over 80% and 89%, respectively. The proposed framework has good practicability in the terminal airspace of airports, which can support the high-precision prediction of departure tracks and the design of protected areas. It is also applicable to track prediction tasks at busy airports and in environments with frequent flight changes.

AI.tldr: 论文提出了一种CNN-Transformer-BiGRU混合模型，用于提高机场终端空域飞行路径预测的准确性。通过高维特征工程和显式标记机制，模型显著降低了预测误差，具有较高的实用性和适用性。
AI.research_question: 如何在机场终端空域中准确预测飞行路径？
AI.motivation: 机场终端空域飞行密度高且干扰多，路径预测不准确会影响飞行安全。
AI.theoretical_framework: 结合CNN、Transformer和BiGRU的混合模型，引入高维特征工程和显式标记机制。
AI.method: 使用CNN-Transformer-BiGRU混合模型，结合物理约束和显式标记机制，验证基于QAR数据集。
AI.findings: 模型显著降低了经度、纬度和高度的预测误差，经度RMSE和MAE分别降低93.77%和94.46%。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种新的混合模型框架，结合了多种深度学习技术和高维特征工程。
AI.practical_contributions: 模型支持高精度飞行路径预测和保护区域设计，适用于繁忙机场和频繁变化的飞行环境。

title: A Sysml-Based Framework Towards Easa Cs-23 Digitalization: An Mbse Approach
affiliations: University of Naples Federico II, University of Naples Federico II, University of Naples Federico II, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: A Sysml-Based Framework Towards Easa Cs-23 Digitalization: An Mbse Approach
detail.abstract: The general aviation sector has experienced a marked increase in relevance, driven by rising aircraft sales and a growing demand for advanced technological solutions. These innovations challenge current certification and operational frameworks, which remain largely Document-Based and inefficient, resulting in increased time and cost burdens for manufacturers.This article proposes a digital, automated framework to support the certification of next-generation general aviation aircraft. The approach is grounded in Model-Based Systems Engineering (MBSE) and utilizes the Systems Modeling Language (SysML) to encode European Union Aviation Safety Agency (EASA) Certification Specifications (CS), including Acceptable Means of Compliance (AMC), in a structured digital model. The proposed methodology aims to significantly reduce certification time and costs, thereby improving the competitiveness of the general aviation market and enabling the development of entirely new aircraft categories. Furthermore, the framework is adaptable to high-performance commercial aircraft certified under the EASA CS-25 or FAA FAR 25 regulations, indicating its broader applicability across the aviation industry.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于模型系统工程（MBSE）和系统建模语言（SysML）的数字化自动化框架，用于支持新一代通用航空飞机的认证，旨在显著减少认证时间和成本，提升通用航空市场的竞争力。
AI.research_question: 如何通过数字化和自动化框架优化通用航空飞机的认证流程？
AI.motivation: 当前通用航空领域的认证和操作框架仍以文档为基础，效率低下，导致时间和成本增加，亟需创新解决方案。

detail.title: An Experimental Comparison of Three Smaa Methods Representing Distinct Preference Rationalities
detail.abstract: Stochastic Multi-Criteria Acceptability Analysis (SMAA) supports decision-making under uncertainty by integrating multiple criteria and imprecise preferences. Despite the diversity of SMAA-based methods, comparative studies are lacking, particularly among SMAA-2, SMAA-PROMETHEE, and SMAA-TODIM, which represent utility-based, outranking-based, and behavioral rationalities. This study experimentally compares these methods to examine conditions under which their stochastic rankings converge. Using a simulated decision problem, we vary the number of alternatives, criteria, and uncertainty levels, assessing similarity through Kendall’s tau and top-rank agreement. Results show that correlation improves with more alternatives, but decreases with more criteria, especially between SMAA-PROMETHEE and SMAA-TODIM, along with reduced agreement on top-ranked alternatives. These effects are partly explained by dominance in the criteria weight structure. No clear pattern emerges regarding performance uncertainty. The findings provide new insights into the robustness and divergence of SMAA methods, offering guidance for method selection under uncertainty.

AI.research_question: 在不确定性条件下，SMAA-2、SMAA-PROMETHEE和SMAA-TODIM方法的随机排名在什么情况下会趋于一致？

detail.title: Corporatemanship: A Virtue-Based Ethical Framework Unifying CSR and Business Ethics

detail.abstract: This article introduces corporatemanship as a normative, virtue-based framework that integrates corporate social responsibility (CSR) and business ethics. Drawing inspiration from sportsmanship, corporatemanship emphasizes the ethical dispositions and virtues that define responsible corporate behavior, including fairness, integrity, and civic responsibility. It provides a unifying framework that addresses the limitations of current CSR models, shifting the focus from instrumental motives to an ethical, virtue-driven approach. By grounding the concept in virtue ethics and institutional theory, this paper offers a robust theoretical lens through which corporate behavior can be understood as a moral practice, not just a strategic one. This concept has significant implications for corporate governance, organizational culture, and the broader discourse on business ethics.The fragmentation between corporate social responsibility (CSR) and business ethics has been a persistent issue in both academic and practical discourse (Gond & Moon, 2011; Scherer & Palazzo, 2007). CSR has often been approached as a strategy for managing risks, building reputation, and addressing stakeholder concerns (Carroll, 1999; Freeman, 1984), while business ethics engages with more fundamental moral questions regarding right and wrong (Solomon, 1992). Although both fields seek to guide corporate behavior, the lack of a unifying ethical framework has limited their ability to address the underlying ethical principles that govern corporate actions. This article introduces corporatemanship, a concept that merges these fields by offering a normative framework grounded in virtue ethics.By drawing an analogy to sportsmanship, corporatemanship advocates for a set of ethical dispositions that enable corporations to engage with society in a manner that reflects fairness, integrity, civic responsibility, and respect for stakeholders. This approach challenges the prevailing instrumentalist view of CSR and repositions corporate responsibility as a moral imperative, grounded in the virtuous practices of individual and collective actors within organizations. In doing so, corporatemanship offers a fresh perspective on how corporations can become moral agents in society.

detail.title: Dynamic Network Formation with Farsighted Players and Limited Capacities
detail.abstract: We investigate a T-stage dynamic network formation game with linear-quadratic payoffs. Players interact through network which they create as a result of their actions. We study two versions of the dynamic game and provide the equilibrium analysis. First, we assume that players sequentially propose links to others with whom they want to connect and choose the levels of contribution for their links. The players have limited total contributions or capacities for forming links at every stage which can differ among players and over time. They cannot delete links, but the principle of natural elimination of links with no contribution is adopted. Next, we assume that the players simultaneously and independently propose links to other players and have overall limited capacities for the whole game, and not for each stage. This means that every player can redistribute the capacity not only over links, but also over time. The equilibrium concept for the first version of the dynamic game is subgame perfect equilibrium, while it is the Nash equilibrium in open-loop strategies for the second version. Both models are illustrated with numerical examples.

detail.title: Automation of Life Cycle Inventory with a Focus on Foreground and Background Data Reconciliation: Application Case on Electrical and Electronic Equipment
detail.abstract: PurposeThis study aims to address the challenge of scaling up the generation of Environmental Product Declarations (EPDs), particularly for Electrical and Electronic Equipment (EEE), in response to growing market demand. We propose a method to automate the life cycle inventory (LCI) phase, which is considered complex and highly dependent on human expertise.MethodsThe methodology is based on the combined use of a semantic knowledge base and a structured decision tree to guide the selection and substitution of LCI flows. It was tested in an industrial context using a complex product (Variable Refrigerant Flow system – VRF) that includes more than 2,000 data points. As the algorithmic implementation is confidential, the study focuses on the methodological principles and experimental results.ResultsThe method enabled a reduction in modeling time from approximately 7 days (manual approach) to just 52 minutes (automated approach). This gain in productivity is driven by automation, which eliminates repetitive tasks that are often source of error.Conclusion and discussionThis research proposes an automated method to accelerate the generation of Environmental Product Declarations (EPDs), demonstrating strong potential for large-scale industrial deployment. However, the criteria of consistency, reproducibility, and precision still need to be validated to fully confirm the potential of the automated approach.

detail.abstract:
We explore the future of global climate cooperation in light of US withdrawal from global climate agreements and the reversal of US federal climate policy. At present, the free-rider problem hampers global collective action; the world needs better mechanisms to incentivize bolder climate policy. Toward this end, we suggest a heavy industry climate coalition. Countries would "join" the coalition by committing to apply a carbon fee (or an equivalent emissions trading system) to emissions-heavy industries, and they would couple that fee with a carbon border adjustment mechanism. We suggest a tiered pricing approach that would be sensitive to countries' economic development levels to broaden coalition participation. The coalition would pair the carbon-pricing mechanism with other inducements for members, including market access, climate finance commitments, and technology transfer agreements. We estimate that a heavy industry climate coalition has the potential to reduce worldwide emissions substantially, acting as a stepping stone for further international climate cooperation.

Note: Reprinted with permission. Chapter 4 in Paris Report 3: Global Action Without Global Governance: Building coalitions for climate transition and nature restoration | Centre for Economic Policy Research (CEPR).

detail.title: Cities: Structure and Meaning Being, Becoming, and the Urban Condition FD Amonya
detail.abstract: Cities are more than built environments or social networks. They are sites where structure and meaning converge-where physical infrastructure and social norms encode layers of memory, power and imagination. This essay explores cities through the ontological lenses of Being and Becoming. It traces their historical depth, critiques current analytical frames such as scaling theory, and exposes the limits of structural thinking. Arguing for a turn toward emergence and historical context, the essay proposes a new approach: to understand cities not merely as systems, but as evolving expressions of collective life. Meaning, it concludes, is always situated, and never cloned.

detail.title: The Effect of CEO Gender on Investor Reactions to CEO Apologies
detail.abstract: This study examines how CEO gender influences investor reactions to CEO apologies. Drawing from multi-disciplinary research on crisis communication and gender stereotypes, the study predicts and finds that CEO apologies lead to more favorable evaluations of the CEO and that this effect is most pronounced when the CEO is male. Additional analyses reveal that while a female CEO’s apology has minimal influence on investor evaluations of her, it does enhance perceptions of the company’s investment attractiveness. In contrast, a male CEO’s apology improves investment attractiveness by positively shaping investor evaluations of the male CEO. These findings offer important insights for understanding gender bias in investor decision making and advancing gender equity in corporate leadership.

detail.title: Partisan Borders: Political Ideology and Labor Market Frictions
detail.abstract: This paper investigates how political partisanship imposes labor market frictions by constraining interstate labor mobility in the United States. I analyze voluntary job transitions by examining interstate employment flows that occur without job separation from the origin state. Exploiting close presidential elections as a quasi-experiment, I find that job flows to destination states decline by 8% when a candidate narrowly wins, breaking previous political alignment between origin and destination states. The adverse effects of political misalignment are most pronounced among college-educated workers, men, younger workers, and white workers. In contrast, gubernatorial election outcomes do not significantly affect interstate labor mobility decisions, suggesting that federal-level political alignment drives these patterns. This study provides evidence that political partisanship imposes frictions in labor markets, hindering the efficient allocation of human capital across geographic boundaries.

detail.title: Stackelberg Competition, Input Market Structure, and the Social Efficiency of Entry: A Supplementary Note
detail.abstract: This note revisits the social efficiency of market entry in a vertically related industry where downstream firms compete à la Stackelberg and upstream input suppliers exert market power. We show that sequential competition discourages entry, especially when input markets are competitive, potentially leading to insufficient entry-contrary to the canonical Cournot outcome. Our analysis complements recent results on entry efficiency in vertical structures, highlighting how the interaction between market timing and input pricing affects welfare. This note supports and extends the findings in Chen et al. (2025, B.E. J. Econ. Anal. Policy). Note: This paper complements the author's recently accepted article in The B.E. Journal of Economic Analysis and Policy (Chen, Wu, Cao, and Wang, 2025), which explores entry efficiency under vertical cost and technology asymmetry. This note isolates the impact of Stackelberg leadership and input market competition, offering an analytically tractable extension with policy implications.

title: Trust in Central Banks as a Moderator in the Digital Era: Linking Social Media Sentiment to Consumer Spending
affiliations: May University in Cairo

detail.title: Trust in Central Banks as a Moderator in the Digital Era: Linking Social Media Sentiment to Consumer Spending
detail.abstract: The digital era has fundamentally reshaped economic governance, compelling central banks to engage with an increasingly interconnected public via social media. This paper investigates the crucial, yet underexplored, role of public trust in central banks as a moderator in the relationship between social media sentiment and aggregate consumer spending, particularly within emerging economies. While central bank transparency is generally beneficial, its amplification through digital platforms introduces complexities such as heightened scrutiny, rapid misinformation dissemination, and potential erosion of trust. A significant research gap exists in understanding how institutional trust precisely modulates the transmission of digital public opinion into real economic behavior, especially in contexts like Egypt, where empirical investigation is limited and nuanced Arabic sentiment analysis poses methodological challenges. This study aims to empirically quantify this moderating effect and develop evidence-based policy recommendations. Employing a quantitative, time-series design, the research will utilize meticulously constructed social media sentiment indices for Egypt (January 2018–December 2024), aggregate consumer spending data from official sources, and a composite index of public trust in the Central Bank of Egypt (CBE). Vector Autoregression (VAR) models, incorporating interaction terms, will analyze dynamic interdependencies and the moderating role of trust, complemented by Generalized Autoregressive Conditional Heteroskedasticity (GARCH) models for volatility analysis. Robustness checks will ensure the reliability of findings. Expected results include a statistically significant relationship between social media sentiment and consumer spending, with high CBE trust attenuating the impact of extreme sentiment and low trust amplifying it. This research will underscore the imperative for central banks to strategically manage public perception and trust in the digital sphere, transforming communication into a potent tool for macroeconomic stability.

detail.abstract: The initially curriculum of Dars e Nizami formulated by Mulla Nizamuddin consisted of eleven sciences and arts, which has been prevalent from the time of Aurangzeb Alamgir to the present day in the religious madrasas of Indo-Pak keeping in mind the various contemporary changes of the time. In the present era, the number of these sciences and arts has reached up to 30. After the partition of Subcontinent, this curriculum has been formally taught in many religious madrasas of Pakistan and as a result, the graduates here were not playing any significant role in the development of the country due to the lack of flexibility in the curriculum. Therefore, during the period of General Zia-ul-Haq, some technical changes were made in the curriculum like some modern arts such as English language, Mathematics, Pakistan Studies etc. were made part of the curriculum and the degree of these graduates was made equal to MA Arabic & Islamic Studies. Now, in the recent past, during the tenure of Prime Minister Imran Khan, emphasis was placed on One Nation Curriculum and the religious madrasas were also required to include modern arts in their curriculum. Therefore, in this regard, the establishment of some new religious boards was also implemented in which Kanz Al-Madaris Board has a very important rule due to its wider range of books included in the curriculum of Dars e Nizami. And further this board's syllabus along with exams pattern is pretty much as per HEC rules and regulations. So, we will compare in this study the books of Dars e Nizami included in Kanz Al-Madaris with the curriculum of HEC so that the current targets of religious madaris can be seemed and compared based on future goals in this modern era. This will be the first comparative research that will prompt religious boards individually to try to adapt their curriculum to the requirements of modern era.

detail.abstract: Wastewater-based epidemiology shows promise as an approach for early influenza incidence prediction within a catchment. This study aimed to predict type-specific influenza incidence using viral RNA concentrations in wastewater. The RNA concentrations of influenza A and B viruses were measured in weekly wastewater samples collected from three treatment plants in Osaka Prefecture, Japan, between April 2023 and April 2025. Influenza cases in the target catchment were apportioned by type using pathogen surveillance data. Models were developed to separately predict influenza A and B cases per sentinel health surveillance based on viral RNA concentrations in wastewater for the first 69 weeks using hierarchical multiple regression analysis. Their performance was then validated over the subsequent 31 weeks. Type-specific influenza cases were predicted with high accuracy (R 2 = 0.859 for influenza A+B cases during the validation period). Furthermore, dummy variables representing a non-outbreak level in the previous week showed negative correlations with the observed values, suggesting that wastewater signals may reflect the true infection incidence regardless of the availability of clinical testing. Influenza incidence estimation through wastewaterbased epidemiology is useful for public health measures such as hospital bed allocation because it can provide information approximately one week earlier than clinical data publications.

detail.title: Consumer Responses to Disclosing AI Involvement in Content Creation: A Field Experiment on Social Media
detail.abstract: As AI-generated content proliferates, regulators and platforms increasingly mandate disclosure of AI involvement. We present a field experiment on social media testing user responses to disclosing ChatGPT's role in generating advertising content, distinguishing between AI-generated and human-AI co-produced content. Contrary to the commonly documented algorithm aversion, we find novel positive disclosure effects: disclosing ChatGPT's involvement in both forms significantly increases user engagement and purchase intention. A complementary survey experiment confirms the positive effect of Human-ChatGPT disclosure. Mechanism analysis reveals that both consumer preference and curiosity shape responses to human-AI collaborative content, while curiosity alone explains responses to AI-generated content. This revealed preference for human-AI collaboration has the potential to steer firms toward retaining human involvement rather than adopting full automation.

detail.abstract: Zanthoxylum armatum DC., commonly known as Timur, is a medicinally and culturally significant plant indigenous to the Himalayan region. Traditionally utilized in Ayurveda, Unani, and various ethnic systems of medicine, the plant has been extensively valued for its culinary use and its therapeutic applications in treating dental disorders, digestive complaints, inflammation, and infections. This chapter provides a comprehensive review of the phytochemical diversity and pharmacological potential of Z. armatum. The plant is rich in bioactive constituents including alkaloids (e.g., berberine, chelerythrine), flavonoids, terpenoids, glycosides, phenolics, tannins, and essential oils containing compounds such as linalool, limonene, and β-caryophyllene. Scientific studies have demonstrated its broad-spectrum antimicrobial, antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, antidiabetic, hypolipidemic, and gastroprotective properties. In addition, emerging evidence supports its roles in immunomodulation, neuroprotection, and potential anticancer activity. Traditional and modern dosage practices are discussed along with considerations for safety, toxicity, and regulatory aspects. Despite its therapeutic promise, gaps remain in clinical validation, standardization, and toxicity profiling. The chapter emphasizes the need for integrated research efforts to fully harness the nutraceutical and pharmaceutical potential of Z. armatum while promoting its sustainable utilization and conservation.

detail.abstract: With the total market capitalisation of crypto-assets amounting to trillions of US dollars, it is clear that crypto taxation needs to be taken seriously by both tax administrations and taxpayers. Over the past few years, numerous tax administrations around the world have devoted resources to crypto taxation, as evidenced by the substantial amount of guidance that has been made available to taxpayers. International organisations such as the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) and the United Nations have also released publications on crypto taxation. Despite all these domestic and international efforts to provide guidance on crypto taxation, there remains considerable uncertainty as to the tax treatment of crypto-assets and transactions. In the first chapter of this excellent book by Shaun Parsons, the current situation is summed up concisely, highlighting “global tax confusion over the treatment of crypto-assets”, absence of a globally coordinated approach, and “lack of consensus about what those tax consequences should be”.

title: Impacts of Coal Fire at Dump Slope Toes on Slope Stability in Arid Open-Pit Mines and a Targeted Control Method

detail.title: Impacts of Coal Fire at Dump Slope Toes on Slope Stability in Arid Open-Pit Mines and a Targeted Control Method
detail.abstract: During open-pit mining, end-dumping of waste material against the pit wall commonly results in the formation of reverse composite slopes. These slopes exert shear stress on shallow-buried coal seams and overlying strata at the slope toe, leading to fracturing and crack propagation. This structural damage facilitates spontaneous combustion of the coal seam, forming coal fire zones that significantly increase the risk of dump slope instability. To address this geotechnical hazard, this study proposes a control technique—the slope toe counterweight method—for preventing coal fires at the toe of dump slopes. Based on Coulomb earth pressure theory, analytical formulas for the geometric design of the counterweight platform are derived to support engineering applications. A case study from an open-pit coal mine in Xinjiang, China, is presented. Field investigations combined with numerical simulations were conducted to analyze the formation mechanisms of coal fires at the waste dump slope toe and their effects on slope stability. The proposed method was implemented in the open-pit mine, and its performance was evaluated. Results demonstrate that the counterweight platform effectively reduces shear deformation, suppresses crack development, and blocks oxygen ingress, thereby controlling coal fire spread and mitigating slope instability risks. Additionally, the method significantly enhances slope stability. This study offers a practical, economical, and efficient engineering solution for coal fire prevention at dump slope toes and provides theoretical and technical support for coal fire mitigation in arid-region open-pit mines.

title: Text Augmentation for Vision: Modality-Preference Aware Few-Shot Learning
affiliations: Xidian University, Xidian University, Xidian University, Xidian University, Xidian University, Xidian University, Xidian University and Xidian University

detail.title: Text Augmentation for Vision: Modality-Preference Aware Few-Shot Learning
detail.abstract: Recent advances in vision-language models such as CLIP show great potential for few-shot learning, but their performance declines under extreme low-shot scenarios due to limited supervision and inherent modality imbalance. To address this, we propose a modality-preference aware framework with textual augmentation to enhance vision-centric few-shot image classification. By treating text descriptions as auxiliary training samples, our method enables effective and scalable augmentation without generating synthetic images. We introduce a training strategy called Alternating-Modality Supervision (AMS), where vision and text samples alternately supervise a shared classifier. We further observe that vision and text favor different loss functions: cross-entropy (CE) for vision and mean squared error (MSE) for text. Based on this, we propose Modality-Preference Loss Assignment (MPLA), which aligns each modality with its preferred objective and improves optimization stability. Extensive experiments on diverse datasets and backbone architectures confirm that combining MPLA with AMS improves few-shot performance and demonstrates strong generalizability.

detail.title: Hqd-Em: Robust Vqa Through Hierarchical Question Decomposition Bias Module and Ensemble Adaptive Angular Margin Loss
detail.abstract: Recent studies in Visual Question Answering (VQA) have revealed that models often rely heavily on language priors rather than vision-language understanding, leading to poor generalization under distribution shifts. To address this challenge, we propose HQD-EM, a unified debiasing framework that combines Hierarchical Question Decomposition module (HQD) with an Ensemble adaptive angular Margin loss (EM). HQD systematically decomposes questions into multi-granular representations to capture layered language biases, while EM leverages bias confidence to modulate per-sample decision margins dynamically. Our method integrates generative bias modeling with adaptive margin learning in an end-to-end trainable architecture. Experiments on VQA benchmarks demonstrate that HQD-EM significantly outperforms prior work and achieves state-of-the-art results on VQA-CP2 and VQA-CP1.

title: The Role of Environmental Groups in Local Fracking Regulation
affiliations: Oregon State University and Oregon State University

detail.title: The Role of Environmental Groups in Local Fracking Regulation
detail.abstract: Hydraulic fracturing (fracking) is often considered the most important innovation in the energy system in the last five decades. Despite substantial research on the impacts of fracking on various economic outcomes, the literature has been largely silent on the subject of regulation. Fracking has been largely exempted from federal environmental legislation. This has allowed state and local governments to regulate fracking activities with a high level of heterogeneity, which ranges from passing resolutions that do not have actual consequences to outright bans. Over the ten years between 2009 and 2018, the number of local regulations increased from 12 to 387. We examine what drives local fracking policies, with a focus on the role of nonprofit environmental organizations in the passing of such regulations. We constructed a novel panel data set that includes information on the presence of fracking regulation in each community and on the activities of environmental groups. We develop a two-way fixed effects model to estimate the effect of environmental groups on the likelihood of a community adopting fracking regulations. Our results show that the presence of environmental groups and their expenditures increase the likelihood of communities adopting fracking regulations.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了非营利环保组织对地方水力压裂（fracking）法规通过的影响，发现环保组织的存在及其支出显著增加了社区通过相关法规的可能性。
AI.research_question: 是什么推动了地方水力压裂政策的制定？特别是非营利环保组织在其中扮演了什么角色？
AI.motivation: 尽管水力压裂对经济影响的研究很多，但关于其监管的文献较少。联邦法规的豁免导致地方监管高度异质性，环保组织的作用值得探讨。
AI.theoretical_framework: 研究基于地方政策制定和环保组织影响力的理论框架。
AI.method: 构建了一个新颖的面板数据集，采用双向固定效应模型分析环保组织对法规通过的影响。
AI.findings: 环保组织的存在及其支出显著增加了社区通过水力压裂法规的可能性。
AI.theory_contributions: 填补了水力压裂监管研究的空白，强调了环保组织在地方政策制定中的作用。

title: Query Expansion with Topic-Aware In-Context Learning and Vocabulary Projection for Open-Domain Dense Retrieval
affiliations: Xidian University, Dalian University of Technology, Xidian University, Xidian University and Xidian University

detail.title: Query Expansion with Topic-Aware In-Context Learning and Vocabulary Projection for Open-Domain Dense Retrieval
detail.abstract: Large language models (LLMs) have recently emerged as pivotal components in opendomain question answering. This study proposes a simple yet effective method to enhance dense retrieval using topic-aware In-Context Learning (ICL) and topic keyword projection. First we leverage LLMs to generate a pseudo-passage based on topic-aware demonstrations obtained from the pre-trained cluster to which the target query belongs. Second, we employ the masked language model (MLM) header in the autoencoder LM to map the query representation to implicitly topic-related tokens as keywords. We combine these two approaches to augment the original query. Extensive experiments on four prevalent open-domain question answering (ODQA) datasets demonstrate that our method achieves an average of 4.26% improvement in R@20 compared to state-ofthe- art query expansion work. Further analysis shows that the relevant demonstrations can provide higher-quality pseudo-passage generation, and the extracted keywords provide an interpretable basis for the effectiveness of dense retrieval. Code and data are available at https://github.com/XD-BDIV-NLP/TDPR.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种通过主题感知上下文学习（ICL）和主题关键词投影增强密集检索的简单有效方法，实验表明其在开放域问答任务中表现优于现有方法。
AI.research_question: 如何通过主题感知上下文学习和主题关键词投影增强密集检索在开放域问答中的表现？
AI.motivation: 大型语言模型（LLMs）在开放域问答中表现突出，但如何进一步优化其密集检索能力仍需探索。
AI.theoretical_framework: 主题感知上下文学习（ICL）和主题关键词投影。
AI.method: 1. 利用LLMs生成基于主题感知演示的伪段落；2. 使用掩码语言模型（MLM）将查询表示映射为隐含主题相关关键词。
AI.findings: 在四个开放域问答数据集上平均R@20提升4.26%，且演示和关键词提取对密集检索效果有显著贡献。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种结合主题感知上下文学习和关键词投影的密集检索增强方法。
AI.practical_contributions: 为开放域问答任务提供了一种高效且可解释的密集检索优化方案。

title: High Speed, Low Impact? Evaluating Forest Impacts from Construction and Operation
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, Duke Kunshan University and Duke University - Policy, Economics, Environment

detail.title: High Speed, Low Impact? Evaluating Forest Impacts from Construction and Operation
detail.abstract: Transport infrastructure for moving people and goods is critical for economic development. However, such investments also affect land use and forest cover by raising access to remote areas. Thus, when siting transport infrastructure, development-environment tradeoffs arise. We examine forest impacts for China’s world-leading investments in high-speed rail (HSR) during 2004-2022, showing and exploiting the exogeneity of HSR arrival in forested areas between end-point cities which drove HSR siting. We find that HSR’s construction phase, often involving ‘feeder’ roads, raised deforestation by 0.2% per year on average (higher for early construction years). In contrast, operation of HSR did not harm forest, on average. For the relatively rare HSR areas with low forest cover, deforestation from construction was higher (~ 0.5% per year) and this additional forest loss continued during operation. These findings suggest that targeted HSR siting, combined with care during construction, can yield high speed with low impact.

AI.tldr: 中国高铁建设在2004-2022年间对森林覆盖的影响研究表明，建设阶段导致年均0.2%的森林减少，而运营阶段对森林无显著影响。低森林覆盖区域的破坏更大，但通过针对性选址和建设管理可实现高速发展与低环境影响的双赢。
AI.research_question: 中国高铁建设对森林覆盖的影响如何？
AI.motivation: 交通基础设施对经济发展至关重要，但其选址可能引发发展与环境的权衡问题。
AI.theoretical_framework: 交通基础设施对土地利用和森林覆盖的影响理论。
AI.method: 利用2004-2022年中国高铁建设的自然实验，分析高铁建设与运营对森林覆盖的影响。
AI.findings: 高铁建设阶段年均导致0.2%的森林减少（早期更高），运营阶段无显著影响；低森林覆盖区域破坏更严重。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了交通基础设施对森林覆盖的动态影响机制。
AI.practical_contributions: 为高铁选址和建设管理提供了减少环境影响的政策建议。

title: Llm-Assisted Labeling and Transformer Model Ensemble for Disaster-Related News Classification in Korean Regional Media (2011–2024)
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Llm-Assisted Labeling and Transformer Model Ensemble for Disaster-Related News Classification in Korean Regional Media (2011–2024)
detail.abstract: Timely situational awareness is critical during disasters, and news media serve as a vital source for rapid and reliable disaster-related information. However, existing news-mining studies primarily focus on a limited set of natural hazards, often neglecting diverse man-made disasters. To address this limitation, we propose a hybrid classification framework combining commercial API-served large language models (C-LLMs) and open-source fine-tunable pre-trained language models (F-PLMs) to classify 31 diverse disaster types. We first automatically labeled 56,563 stratified news headlines from 2.77 million articles using two C-LLMs (GPT-3.5-Turbo and Gemini-2.0 Flash-Lite). Human reviewers manually adjudicated only discrepant cases (19.1%), significantly reducing manual labeling effort. This labeled dataset was then used to fine-tune two transformer-based F-PLMs (BERT and KoELECTRA), which were combined into a soft-voting ensemble. The ensemble achieved a Macro-F1 score of 0.9589, closely approaching the best-performing C-LLM (Gemini, 0.9817). Temporal analysis of classified news articles showed strong alignment with 92 official activation dates of Korea’s Central Disaster and Safety Countermeasures Headquarters, validating the framework’s real-world applicability. The proposed hybrid approach is currently utilized by Korea’s National Disaster Management Research Institute for real-time disaster news monitoring and serves as one of the essential references for governmental disaster-budget prioritization.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种结合商业API大语言模型（C-LLMs）和开源可微调预训练语言模型（F-PLMs）的混合分类框架，用于分类31种不同类型的灾害新闻标题，显著减少了人工标注工作量，并在实际应用中验证了其有效性。
AI.research_question: 如何高效且准确地分类多样化的灾害类型新闻标题，以支持实时灾害监测？
AI.motivation: 现有新闻挖掘研究主要关注有限的自然灾害类型，忽视了多样化的人为灾害，亟需一种更全面的分类方法。
AI.theoretical_framework: 结合商业API大语言模型（C-LLMs）和开源可微调预训练语言模型（F-PLMs）的混合分类框架。
AI.method: 使用两种C-LLMs自动标注新闻标题，人工仅处理不一致案例；随后微调两种F-PLMs，并通过软投票集成模型进行分类。
AI.findings: 集成模型的Macro-F1得分为0.9589，接近最佳C-LLM（Gemini，0.9817）；时间分析与官方灾害激活日期高度一致。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种高效的混合分类框架，显著减少了人工标注工作量。
AI.practical_contributions: 该框架被韩国国家灾害管理研究所用于实时灾害新闻监测，并为政府灾害预算优先排序提供参考。

title: Βetas Distribution and ETF Tracking Error
affiliations: ALBA Graduate Business School and University of Edinburgh

detail.title: Βetas Distribution and ETF Tracking Error
detail.abstract: We measure the effect on the tracking error of indexed, sampling-based exchange traded funds’ (ETFs) from the changing variation in the empirical distribution of the betas for the index’s constituent stocks. We find that the tracking error is positively related with increased variance in the distribution of betas of the index’s constituents when the ETFs are pursuing a sampling strategy, rather than an exact replication of the index. Unlike the extant literature on ETF tracking error that primarily focuses on market frictions, our results are novel by highlighting the importance of the design of an ETF in the magnitude of its tracking error.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了基于抽样的指数ETF跟踪误差与指数成分股贝塔值分布变化的关系，发现抽样策略下跟踪误差与贝塔值分布的方差正相关。
AI.research_question: 抽样策略的指数ETF跟踪误差如何受指数成分股贝塔值分布变化的影响？
AI.motivation: 现有文献主要关注市场摩擦对ETF跟踪误差的影响，本文探讨ETF设计对跟踪误差的重要性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于ETF设计和跟踪误差的理论，特别是抽样策略与完全复制策略的差异。
AI.method: 通过测量指数成分股贝塔值分布的变化，分析其对ETF跟踪误差的影响。
AI.findings: 抽样策略下，ETF跟踪误差与指数成分股贝塔值分布的方差正相关。
AI.theory_contributions: 强调了ETF设计（如抽样策略）对跟踪误差的理论影响，补充了现有文献。
AI.practical_contributions: 为ETF设计者提供了优化抽样策略以减少跟踪误差的实践指导。

title: IPO, Labor Investment Efficiency, and Performance Reversal
affiliations: Xiamen University, Xiamen University and Toronto Metropolitan University (formerly Ryerson University)

detail.title: IPO, Labor Investment Efficiency, and Performance Reversal
detail.abstract: This paper investigates the impact of going public on startups’ post-IPO labor investment efficiency, a crucial aspect of optimizing corporate resource allocation. Using a sample of IPO firms listed in Chinese stock market, we find that, compared to the period before the IPO, entrepreneurial firms experience not only an exacerbation of labor overinvestment post-IPO but also a mitigation of labor underinvestment. However, the severity of exacerbated labor underinvestment is more pronounced and offsets the benefits of alleviated labor underinvestment, ultimately leading to labor investment inefficiency. The post-IPO liquidity and empire-building effects explain the labor investment inefficiency. Heterogeneity analysis reveals the reduced labor investment efficiency post-IPO is more pronounced among non-SOEs, firms with higher cost of borrowing and poorer corporate governance, and those with pre-IPO suspension and favorable pre-IPO market performance. Further analysis indicates the inefficiency of labor investment post-IPO tends to hinder the long-term financial performance, triggering post-IPO performance reversal.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了上市对初创企业IPO后劳动力投资效率的影响，发现上市后劳动力过度投资加剧，而劳动力投资不足有所缓解，但总体导致效率下降。流动性效应和帝国建设效应是主要原因。
AI.research_question: 上市如何影响初创企业IPO后的劳动力投资效率？
AI.motivation: 劳动力投资效率是企业资源优化配置的关键，但上市对其影响尚不明确。
AI.theoretical_framework: 流动性效应和帝国建设效应。
AI.method: 基于中国股市IPO企业的样本分析。
AI.findings: 上市后劳动力过度投资加剧，投资不足缓解，但总体效率下降，且对非国企、高融资成本、治理差的企业影响更大。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了上市对劳动力投资效率的双重影响机制。
AI.practical_contributions: 为企业IPO后的劳动力资源配置提供了决策参考。

title: Financing Infrastructure Development Through Resource Rents: Is There a Curse?
affiliations: Omar Bongo University, Laboratory and Technical Analysis Office  (LABAT)

detail.title: Financing Infrastructure Development Through Resource Rents: Is There a Curse?
detail.abstract: This study tests the resource curse hypothesis by analysing the direct effect of rent financing on infrastructure development in the 24 most resource-rich African countries between 2005 and 2021 (with an average rent level of 10%). In order to assess the indirect role of financial development in this relationship, we incorporate the six financial development indicators from Sahay et al (2015). Thus, based on a correctly specified two-stage GMM system (Blundell and Bond, 1998), we find a negative and significant relationship between total resource rents and the African Infrastructure Development Index. More specifically, dependence on resource rents prevents the most resource-rich countries from financing their infrastructure development, thus confirming the natural resource curse hypothesis. Furthermore, our results reveal the moderating role of financial development in that a developed financial sector mitigates the negative effect of rents on infrastructure development.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过分析24个资源最丰富的非洲国家（2005-2021年）中租金融资对基础设施发展的直接影响，验证了资源诅咒假说。结合金融发展的间接作用，发现资源租金与基础设施发展呈显著负相关，且金融发展可缓解这一负面影响。
AI.research_question: 资源租金对非洲基础设施发展的直接影响是什么？金融发展在这一关系中起什么作用？
AI.motivation: 验证资源诅咒假说，并探讨金融发展在资源租金与基础设施发展关系中的调节作用。
AI.theoretical_framework: 资源诅咒假说、金融发展理论。
AI.method: 基于Blundell和Bond（1998）的两阶段GMM系统模型，分析24个资源丰富的非洲国家数据（2005-2021年）。
AI.findings: 资源租金与基础设施发展呈显著负相关；金融发展可缓解资源租金对基础设施的负面影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了资源诅咒假说，并扩展了金融发展在资源依赖国家中的作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了金融发展在缓解资源诅咒中的重要性，建议加强金融体系建设。

title: Home Purchases with and Without Mortgage Credits: Implications for Portfolio Investment
affiliations: Central Bank of the Republic of Turkey and ADA University

detail.title: Home Purchases with and Without Mortgage Credits: Implications for Portfolio Investment
detail.abstract: This paper explores the impact of home purchase on the portfolio allocation of U.S. households, as buying a home is one of the largest purchasing decisions over the life cycle. An instrumental variable estimation method is applied to the Panel Study of Income Dynamics data to show significant differences in the portfolio behaviors of households prior to the purchase decision. While liquidity-constrained households who are planning to purchase a home with mortgage loans save mostly in the form of risk-free assets, liquidity-unconstrained households who are planning to purchase a home without any mortgage loans save mostly in the form of risky assets. We further employ and compute a parsimonious model of house purchasing decision to show that the aforementioned portfolio allocation differential can be captured with reasonable parameterizations. These results may imply that an optimal portfolio allocation for liquidity-constrained households could help them purchase the same home earlier or buy a larger home with the same duration of mortgage.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了购房对美国家庭投资组合分配的影响，发现流动性受限和不受限家庭在购房前的投资行为存在显著差异。
AI.research_question: 购房如何影响美国家庭的投资组合分配？
AI.motivation: 购房是生命周期中最大的购买决策之一，研究其对投资行为的影响具有重要意义。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于生命周期理论和投资组合理论。
AI.method: 采用工具变量估计方法分析Panel Study of Income Dynamics数据，并构建简约模型。
AI.findings: 流动性受限家庭倾向于持有无风险资产，而流动性不受限家庭倾向于持有风险资产。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了购房决策对家庭投资组合行为的理论影响。
AI.practical_contributions: 为流动性受限家庭优化投资组合以更快购房或购买更大住房提供了实践建议。

title: Comprehensive Performance Benchmarking and Comparative Analysis of Active Ransomware Threats
affiliations: Edinburgh Napier University and Edinburgh Napier University

detail.title: Comprehensive Performance Benchmarking and Comparative Analysis of Active Ransomware Threats

keywords.keywords: Ransomware Performance and BehaviourRansomware Execution BenchmarkingTest Dataset Generation and EvaluationRansomware DetectionCyber SecurityRansomware MitigationMalware

detail.abstract: Ransomware remains a pervasive cybersecurity threat, causing significant financial and operational disruptions across industries. Modern variants employ sophisticated encryption techniques, selective file targeting, and rapid execution strategies, leaving victims with minimal response time. Yet, limited research compares the performance of different strains in terms of encryption speed, execution efficiency, and system impact factors vital for effective attack prevention and mitigation. Current studies focus largely on detection and mitigation, with little attention to ransomware's operational efficiency. The absence of standardised, freely available, datasets further impedes comparative benchmarking, and recent advancements in encryption methods necessitate updated evaluations of execution times, speeds, and resource utilisation. This study addresses these gaps through a comprehensive benchmarking analysis of active ransomware threats. A novel dataset of 29 active ransomware strains was developed, and a controlled testing environment was established to systematically analyse their execution behaviour. A structured target dataset simulating real-world file systems was also created to facilitate robust comparative analysis. Key performance metrics, including encryption speed, execution time, and thread utilisation were evaluated using these datasets within a virtualised, isolated test environment. The dataset generation followed best practice principles, ensuring reproducibility and both datasets are freely available to the research community. Empirical results reveal significant variations, with encryption speeds ranging from 33 MB/s to 2.79 GB/s. The fastest strain, Trigona, achieved an encryption rate 84 times higher than the slowest, CL0P, highlighting diverse optimisation strategies. Distinct behavioural patterns, such as pre-encryption delays and multi-threading utilisation, substantially influence performance, offering critical insights into ransomware evolution and underscoring the need for adaptive defences. This work offers three key contributions: a comprehensive dataset of active ransomware, a realistic target dataset, and a rigorous benchmark analysis of ransomware performance. Collectively, these contributions provide a valuable opportunity for the cybersecurity community to refine detection tools, optimise system performance, and enhance proactive prevention measures.

title: Strip–Till Farming: Combining Controlled–Release Blended Fertilizer to Enhance Rainfed Maize N Use Efficiency While Mitigate Nr Footprint and Carbon Footprint in the Hilly Region of Northeast China
affiliations: Inner Mongolia Agricultural University, Inner Mongolia Agricultural University, Inner Mongolia Agricultural University, Inner Mongolia Agricultural University, Inner Mongolia Agricultural University, Inner Mongolia Agricultural University, Inner Mongolia Agricultural University, affiliation not provided to SSRN, Inner Mongolia Agricultural University and Inner Mongolia Agricultural University

detail.title: Strip–Till Farming: Combining Controlled–Release Blended Fertilizer to Enhance Rainfed Maize N Use Efficiency While Mitigate Nr Footprint and Carbon Footprint in the Hilly Region of Northeast China
detail.abstract: Agricultural intensification in Northeast China's hilly rainfed regions is hindered by low maize productivity and high environmental costs caused by unscientific farming and fertilization practices. The exploration of tillage methods and corresponding fertilization modes aimed at enhancing maize nitrogen use efficiency and economic benefits, while reducing environmental costs in this region. A field experiment (2021-2022) employed two principal factors: A) Tillage systems: The differences between strip–till (RST) and conventional ridge cropping (CP), straw off-field no-tillage (NT), and no-tillage with straw mulching (RNT) were comparatively investigated in the conventional fertilizer (Sd) mode. B) Fertilization regimes under RST: conventional fertilization (Sd), controlled–release urea blends (30%Cr, 50%Cr), and nitrogen–free control. Life cycle assessment (LCA) and Z-score analysis were used to evaluate environmental impacts, yield, nitrogen use efficiency, economic benefits, and overall maize production performance. RST significantly outperformed CP by 46.6% in yield, 62.0% in nitrogen use efficiency (NUE), and 8.2% in net economic benefits. Concurrently, demonstrated 4.9% and 4.7% reductions in Carbon and Nr footprints respectively. Under strip-till, the 50%Cr treatment increased yield, NUE, and net economic benefits by 48.9%, 8.8%, and 11.9% over Sd; reduced nitrogen loss, NH3 volatilization, and N2O emissions by 21.3%, 52.0%, and 8.6%; and lowered Carbon and Nr footprints by 11.4% and 38.9%, respectively. This study shows that RST combined with 50%Cr boosts yield and reduces environmental impacts in rainfed maize systems, offering practical solutions for ecological intensification and sustainable development in Northeast China's fragile agroecosystems.

AI.tldr: 研究通过对比不同耕作和施肥模式，发现带状耕作（RST）结合50%控释尿素（50%Cr）显著提高玉米产量、氮利用效率及经济效益，同时降低环境成本。
AI.research_question: 如何通过耕作和施肥模式优化提高东北丘陵雨养区玉米的氮利用效率和经济效益，同时减少环境成本？
AI.motivation: 东北丘陵雨养区玉米生产力低且环境成本高，亟需科学耕作和施肥方法以实现生态集约化和可持续发展。
AI.theoretical_framework: 生命周期评估（LCA）和Z-score分析用于评估环境影响、产量、氮利用效率、经济效益及玉米生产表现。

title: A New Benchmark for Human Action Recognition with Moving Cameras
affiliations: National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University, National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University, National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University and National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University

detail.title: A New Benchmark for Human Action Recognition with Moving Cameras
detail.abstract: Although skeleton-based human action recognition (HAR) has been widely studied, most existing models are designed for static cameras. With the growing use of mobile devices, HAR under moving cameras remains underexplored due to challenges in dataset collection and robustness to motion. In this work, we propose an inexpensive-yet-e!ective synthesis method that converts static-camera 3D skeleton data into 2D/3D moving-camera data, establishing the first comprehensive benchmark for this setting.We show that 2D and 3D HAR models su!er accuracy drops of 3~5% and 10~15% respectively under moving cameras, mainly due to missing keypoints and inconsistent views. To address this, we propose a new preprocessing method that converts skeletal data into Gaussian-Blurred Connected Heatmaps (GBCH), apply a masked autoencoder on GBCH, and design a multi-modal transformer model with hybrid attention. Our method outperforms state-of-the-art 2D HAR models in both static and moving-camera scenarios.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种低成本但有效的方法，将静态摄像头的3D骨架数据转换为2D/3D移动摄像头数据，并建立了首个全面的基准测试。研究发现，移动摄像头下2D和3D HAR模型的准确率分别下降3~5%和10~15%，主要原因是关键点缺失和视角不一致。为解决这一问题，作者提出了一种新的预处理方法（GBCH），并设计了一种多模态Transformer模型，显著提升了性能。
AI.research_question: 如何在移动摄像头场景下提升基于骨架的人体动作识别（HAR）的准确性和鲁棒性？
AI.motivation: 随着移动设备的普及，移动摄像头下的HAR研究不足，主要由于数据集收集困难和运动鲁棒性挑战。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于骨架的动作识别、多模态Transformer模型、高斯模糊连接热图（GBCH）预处理方法。
AI.method: 1. 提出一种合成方法，将静态摄像头数据转换为移动摄像头数据；2. 设计GBCH预处理方法；3. 应用掩码自编码器；4. 提出多模态Transformer模型。
AI.findings: 2D和3D HAR模型在移动摄像头下准确率分别下降3~5%和10~15%；提出的方法在静态和移动摄像头场景下均优于现有模型。
